name: Spadeyard
description:
Welcome graveyard keeper! It's 12 o'clock. Your job tonight is not only to keep the graves nice and tidy with your draggable sponge thingy but also to prevent the undead from invading the village through the top gate.

Just select your spade and give them one or two friendly slaps with it. The white zombies are nice and just want stretch their legs a bit. If you can protect them from the mean green zombies you'll receive a better rating at the graveyard keeper's leaderboard.

This game was made during one week for the Spooktober Game Jam 2021 by Colleen, Denice, Leon and Markus.
